verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> Now it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <WH3651> this וַיָּ֕מָת <WH4191> died נָחָ֖שׁ <WH5176> that Nahash מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> and his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> And David אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> I will shew חֶ֣סֶד ׀ <WH2617> kindness עִם־ <WH5973> with חָנ֣וּן <WH2586> unto Hanun בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נָחָ֗שׁ <WH5176> of Nahash כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> shewed אָבִ֤יו <WH1> because his father עִמִּי֙ <WH5973> with חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> kindness וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> to me And David מַלְאָכִ֖ים <WH4397> messengers לְנַחֲמ֣וֹ <WH5162> to comfort עַל־ <WH5921> concerning אָבִ֑יו <WH1> him concerning his father וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <WH935> came עַבְדֵ֨י <WH5650> So the servants דָוִ֜יד <WH1732> of David אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> into the land בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֛וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon אֶל־ <WH413> to חָנ֖וּן <WH2586> to Hanun לְנַחֲמֽוֹ׃ <WH5162> to comfort

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <WH559> said שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> But the princes בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֜וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon לְחָנ֗וּן <WH2586> to Hanun הַֽמְכַבֵּ֨ד <WH3513> doth honour דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> thou that David אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> thy father בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> Thinkest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> that he hath sent לְךָ֖ מְנַחֲמִ֑ים <WH5162> comforters הֲלֹ֡א <WH3808> not בַּ֠עֲבוּר <WH5668> to you לַחְקֹ֨ר <WH2713> unto thee for to search וְלַהֲפֹ֤ךְ <WH2015> and to overthrow וּלְרַגֵּל֙ <WH7270> and to spy out הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> common בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> come עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> unto thee? are not his servants אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about פ

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took חָנ֜וּן <WH2586> Wherefore Hanun אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> servants דָוִיד֙ <WH1732> David's וַֽיְגַלְּחֵ֔ם <WH1548> and shaved וַיִּכְרֹ֧ת <WH3772> them and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> מַדְוֵיהֶ֛ם <WH4063> their garments בַּחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> in the midst עַד־ <WH5704> far הַמִּפְשָׂעָ֑ה <WH4667> hard by their buttocks וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃ <WH7971> and sent them away

וַיֵּלְכוּ֩ <WH1980> went וַיַּגִּ֨ידוּ <WH5046> [certain] and told לְדָוִ֤יד <WH1732> David עַל־ <WH5921> about הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> how the men וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> were served And he sent לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <WH7125> to meet כִּי־ <WH3588> for הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> them for the men נִכְלָמִ֣ים <WH3637> ashamed מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> were greatly וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king שְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> Tarry בִֽירֵח֔וֹ <WH3405> at Jericho עַ֛ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יְצַמַּ֥ח <WH6779> be grown זְקַנְכֶ֖ם <WH2206> until your beards וְשַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <WH7725> and [then] return

וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> saw בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And when the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon כִּ֥י <WH3588> themselves הִֽתְבָּאֲשׁ֖וּ <WH887> that they had made themselves odious עִם־ <WH5973> with דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> to David וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent חָ֠נוּן <WH2586> Hanun וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> and the children עַמּ֜וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> a thousand כִּכַּר־ <WH3603> talents כֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> of silver לִשְׂכֹּ֣ר <WH7936> to hire לָ֠הֶם מִן־ <WH4480> at אֲרַ֨ם נַהֲרַ֜יִם <WH763> out of Mesopotamia וּמִן־ <WH4480> at אֲרַ֤ם <WH758> Aram מַעֲכָה֙ <WH4601> Maachah וּמִצּוֹבָ֔ה <WH6678> and out of Zobah רֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> them chariots וּפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6571> and horsemen

וַיִּשְׂכְּר֣וּ <WH7936> So they hired לָהֶ֡ם שְׁנַיִם֩ <WH8147> and two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> thirty אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> thousand רֶ֗כֶב <WH7393> chariots וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king מַעֲכָה֙ <WH4601> of Maachah וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> and his people וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <WH935> who came וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before מֵידְבָ֑א <WH4311> Medeba וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children עַמּ֗וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon נֶאֶסְפוּ֙ <WH622> gathered themselves together מֵעָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5892> from their cities וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> to battle

וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> heard דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> And when David וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> [of it] he sent אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> Joab וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all צָבָ֖א <WH6635> and all the host הַגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1368> of the mighty men

וַיֵּצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> came out בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיַּֽעַרְכ֥וּ <WH6186> in array מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> and put the battle פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> before the gate הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וְהַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> and the kings אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֔אוּ <WH935> that were come לְבַדָּ֖ם <WH905> themselves בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> [were] by themselves in the field

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> Now when Joab כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיְתָ֧ה <WH1961> become פְנֵי־ <WH6440> was set against him before הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> that the battle אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> against פָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> front וְאָח֑וֹר <WH268> and behind וַיִּבְחַ֗ר <WH977> he chose out מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּחוּר֙ <WH970> the choice בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <WH6186> and put [them] in array לִקְרַ֥את <WH7125> against אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> the Syrians

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> And the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people נָתַ֕ן <WH5414> he delivered בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> unto the hand אַבְשַׁ֣י <WH52> of Abishai אָחִ֑יו <WH251> his brother וַיַּ֣עַרְכ֔וּ <WH6186> and they set [themselves] in array לִקְרַ֖את <WH7125> against בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אִם־ <WH518> If תֶּחֱזַ֤ק <WH2388> be too strong מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <WH4480> are too אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> If the Syrians וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> become לִּ֖י לִתְשׁוּעָ֑ה <WH8668> for me then thou shalt help ס וְאִם־ <WH518> if בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> me but if the children עַמּ֛וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon יֶֽחֶזְק֥וּ <WH2388> be too strong מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> are too וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH3467> for thee then I will help

חֲזַ֤ק <WH2388> Be of good courage וְנִֽתְחַזְּקָה֙ <WH2388> and let us behave ourselves valiantly בְּעַד־ <WH1157> the sake עַמֵּ֔נוּ <WH5971> for our people וּבְעַ֖ד <WH1157> the sake עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and for the cities אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> of our God וַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and let the LORD הַטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> [that which is] good בְּעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> in his sight יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> do

וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <WH5066> that [were] with him drew nigh יוֹאָ֜ב <WH3097> So Joab וְהָעָ֧ם <WH5971> and the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> with לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> the Syrians לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> unto the battle וַיָּנ֖וּסוּ <WH5127> and they fled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> And when the children עַמּ֤וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon רָאוּ֙ <WH7200> saw כִּי־ <WH3588> for נָ֣ס <WH5127> were fled אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> that the Syrians וַיָּנ֣וּסוּ <WH5127> they likewise fled גַם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֗ם <WH1992> like מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> before אַבְשַׁ֣י <WH52> Abishai אָחִ֔יו <WH251> his brother וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and entered הָעִ֑ירָה <WH5892> into the city וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> Then Joab יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem פ

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw אֲרָ֗ם <WH758> And when the Syrians כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נִגְּפוּ֮ <WH5062> that they were put to the worse לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Israel וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> they sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers וַיּוֹצִ֣יאוּ <WH3318> and drew forth אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> the Syrians אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> that [were] beyond הַנָּהָ֑ר <WH5104> the river וְשׁוֹפַ֛ךְ <WH7780> and Shophach שַׂר־ <WH8269> the captain צְבָ֥א <WH6635> of the host הֲדַדְעֶ֖זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> [went] before

וַיֻּגַּ֣ד <WH5046> And it was told לְדָוִ֗יד <WH1732> David וַיֶּאֱסֹ֤ף <WH622> and he gathered אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> all Israel וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> and passed over הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> and came אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> against וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <WH6186> upon them and set [the battle] in array אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> against וַיַּעֲרֹ֨ךְ <WH6186> in array דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> against them So when David לִקְרַ֤את <WH7125> against אֲרָם֙ <WH758> the Syrians מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> had put the battle וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> they fought עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> against

וַיָּ֣נָס <WH5127> fled אֲרָם֮ <WH758> But the Syrians מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Israel וַיַּהֲרֹ֨ג <WH2026> slew דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> and David מֵאֲרָ֗ם <WH758> of the Syrians שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> seven אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand רֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> [men which fought in] chariots וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> and forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> he רַגְלִ֑י <WH7273> foot וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> שׁוֹפַ֥ךְ <WH7780> Shophach שַֽׂר־ <WH8269> the captain הַצָּבָ֖א <WH6635> of the host הֵמִֽית׃ <WH4191> and killed

וַיִּרְא֞וּ <WH7200> saw עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> And when the servants הֲדַדְעֶ֗זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִגְּפוּ֙ <WH5062> that they were put to the worse לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וַיַּשְׁלִ֥ימוּ <WH7999> they made peace עִם־ <WH5973> with דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> with David וַיַּֽעַבְדֻ֑הוּ <WH5647> and became his servants וְלֹא־ <WH3808> were not אָבָ֣ה <WH14> neither would אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> the Syrians לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> help אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> anymore פ
